history.proof: intros H. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_ext_loc. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_comm,is_lim_ext_loc. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_scal_l,Rmult_comm,is_lim_ext_loc.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a : R x : Rbar H : ex_lim f x Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?M2365 P -> filtermap ?M2363 (Rbar_locally' ?M2364) P" with "exists l : Rbar, is_lim (fun y : R => a * f y) x l".
The LHS of Rmult_comm (_ * _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H2 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y = g y) -> is_lim f x l -> is_lim g x l H : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 f : R -> R a : R x, x0 : Rbar H1 : is_lim f x x0 Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Rbar_mult ?M3098 ?M3100) P -> filtermap (fun y : R => ?M3098 * ?M3097 y) (Rbar_locally' ?M3099) P" with "exists l : Rbar, is_lim (fun y : R => a * f y) x l".

original: intros H. apply (is_lim_ext_loc (fun y => a * f y)). - unfold Rbar_locally'. intros y. now rewrite Rmult_comm. - apply is_lim_scal_l. apply H.
